job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Hiretual is an AI-Powered Global Talent Platform for enterprises. It has been recognized as one of the best data management SaaS for talent acquisition in the market and trusted by 100+ Fortune 500 customers(Amazon, Nike, Paypal, Intel, etc.)<br><br>As a machine learning engineer, you will join the core engineering team to develop the algorithm, framework, and product intelligence towards an AI and data-driven SaaS. You will be working with top AI researchers and infrastructure gurus to explore unlimited career space.<br><br><strong>Resonsibilities<br></strong><ul> <li>Develop highly scalable tools leveraging machine learning models to solve problems such as classification, clustering, topic modeling, natural language processing and recommendation</li> <li>Develop in-house machine learning tools and pipelines to support fast experimentation of machine learning models</li> <li>Collaborate with Data Engineers to prototype new algorithms and design experiments for evaluation to enhance the marketing efficiency</li> <li>Work with engineering teams to implement new models while considering functionality for recommendation output</li> <li>Take end to end ownership of Machine Learning systems - from data pipelines and training, to real-time prediction engines</li> <li>Contribute to a culture of continuous improvement, and data driven results</li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br><br></u></strong>You must have<br><ul> <li>A Ph.D. or Master degree in computer science, math, physics, or related majors, with 2 years + full-time industry experience</li> <li>Developed and launched AI product</li> <br></ul>It would be best if you were an expert at one of the following<br><ul> <li>Knowledge discovery and information retrieval entity recognition, relation extraction, and knowledge learning from unstructured data</li> <li>Machine learning-powered recommendation systems and ranking algorithms content-based recommendation, collaborative filtering, etc.</li> <li>Natural Language Processing (NLP) deep learning and statistical learning</li> <li>Deep Graph Learning</li> <br><br></ul><u><strong>Benefits<br></strong></u><ul> <li>Unlimited growth/promotion space</li> <li>Competitive salary and options</li> <li>401k plan with a 3% contribution</li> <li>Free daily lunch &amp; dinner</li> <li>Comprehensive medical, dental, and life insurance with 100% coverage</li> <li>Generous PTO policy</li> <li>Commuter benefits</li> <li>Mac or PC - up to you</li> <br></ul>Want to see how well you match up with this job? Try out our free job search chrome extension, JobSeer at https //go.jobseer.ai/jds
